name: Ninja Cube || Scratch > HTML
description:
Arrow keys to move and press space to use weapon. Also avoid bad stuff.

I originally developed this with Scratch so you can find it here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/635695066/! (also made by me)

I used https://sheeptester.github.io/htmlifier/  to convert Scratch projects into HTML files, so I could upload it here.
